author: Benedikttk
body: As previously discussed at the CoreSoftware meeting at 30/Jul,2024: [indico link](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1442038/) and 20/Aug,2024: [indico link](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1447580/). This PR aims to test python code quality checks in the CMSSW infrastructure.
title: Adding python quality checks to the CMSSW
